title: Chapter 1111
volume_title: Sword In Hand, He Stands Above The Wilds, Sovereign Throughout The Ages
body:
Chapter 1111

As the tribulation descended, its forceful, calamitous aura instantly tore a hole through the Primordial Hellscape Painting.

The numerous terrifying entities were cut down like wheat beneath a scythe.

That destructive power left even the Profound Unity old fossils’ hearts quivering with fright.

None of them had anticipated that the light of the tribulation would seem so weak in front of Su Yi. It shattered as easily as glass!

It was unquestionably far too astonishing.

But mere moments later, the Skythorn Poison Emperor couldn’t help but throw back his head and laugh. “Wondrous! By borrowing the power of your tribulation, you broke through that dense encirclement in one fell swoop. Your methods are like seizing fortune from the heavens, and your spirit is unparalleled!” 

He sounded both comforted and excited.

“I just knew nothing would happen to Master…” muttered Ye Luo.

Jin Kui, Wang Que, and the others looked at each other and laughed. All of them felt a massive weight lift from their shoulders.

Earlier, they’d sweated on their master’s behalf, and they weren’t confident that he’d pull through.

But now, they realized that they’d let their imagination get the best of them. The situation had always been under their master’s control!

“His Excellency...
